faqs.question: Where are your hostels located?
faqs.answer: We have hostels in several cities; you can find the exact location of each one on our website.

faqs.question: What types of rooms do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a variety of rooms, from private rooms to shared dormitories. You can find more information on our website.

faqs.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faqs.answer: Check-in starts at 12:00, and check-out is at 11:00. If you need to check in earlier or later, please contact us so we can make the necessary arrangements. (Also available via WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Do you offer transportation to and from the airport?
faqs.answer: Some of our hostels offer an airport shuttle service for an additional fee. Please contact us for more information. (+34 628991703 on WhatsApp as well)

faqs.question: Is there internet access?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our hostels provide free internet access for our guests.

faqs.question: Do you allow pets?
faqs.answer: I’m sorry, but we do not allow pets in our hostels.

faqs.question: Are towels included in the room price?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide free towels for guests in private rooms. For shared dorm rooms, towels are available as a paid extra service.

faqs.question: Do you offer breakfast?
faqs.answer: We currently do not include breakfast in the price, but as a courtesy to start your morning with a smile, we provide instant coffee, powdered milk, various teas, and muffins!

faqs.question: What time is breakfast served?
faqs.answer: Breakfast hours vary by hostel but are generally from 8:00 to 10:30, or 8:30 to 11:00 at Arena Nest.

faqs.question: Can I cook in the hostel’s kitchen?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our hostels have a shared kitchen for guest use.

faqs.question: Do you offer laundry services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer laundry service for an additional fee.

faqs.question: Is there parking available?
faqs.answer: Some of our hostels offer free or paid parking. Please contact us for more information.

faqs.question: Can I store my luggage after check-out?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide luggage storage services for our guests.

faqs.question: Do you offer tours or activities in the city?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer tours and activities in the city for an additional charge. Please contact us for more information.

faqs.question: Can I book a room without a credit card?
faqs.answer: I’m sorry, but we require a valid credit card to confirm all bookings.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts for extended stays?
faqs.answer: Yes. We have a rate called “Nest Pass” that applies for a week or a month with a discount of more than 30%. You can book it through the website as long as you select seven days or more. Please contact us for more information. (+34 628991703 on WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Is there a minimum age to stay at your hostels?
faqs.answer: Yes, the minimum age to stay in our hostels is 18 years old.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my reservation?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can.

faqs.question: What is the cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Our cancellation policy varies depending on the rate and type of room booked. Generally, you can cancel or change up to 48 hours before the booked date.

faqs.question: Is there a deadline to cancel my reservation?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can usually cancel or change your reservation up to 48 hours before the booked date without additional charges.

faqs.question: Can I change my reservation?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change your reservation depending on availability and the policy for the rate you booked. Generally, changes can be made up to 48 hours before the booked date.

faqs.question: Can I add an extra night to my stay?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can add an extra night depending on room availability. Please contact us to make the necessary arrangements.

faqs.question: Can I pay in cash?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept cash payments. Please contact us for more information about our payment options.

faqs.question: Can I pay with a debit card?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept debit cards. Please contact us for more information about our payment options.

faqs.question: Can I make a reservation for someone else?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can make a reservation for another person. Please ensure you provide all the necessary information for the guest.

faqs.question: Do you offer rooms with a private bathroom?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer rooms with a private bathroom for an additional fee. Please check our website for more information.

faqs.question: What is the noise policy in the hostel?
faqs.answer: We ask our guests to respect everyone's rest and avoid making noise after 11 p.m. In case of problems, please contact the reception.

faqs.question: Do you have accessibility for people with disabilities?
faqs.answer: Some of our hostels have facilities for people with disabilities. Please contact us for more information. (Also via WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Do you offer daily cleaning services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer daily cleaning services in our rooms and common areas.

faqs.question: Can I smoke in the hostel?
faqs.answer: We do not allow smoking inside our hostels. There is a designated smoking area outside the hostel.

faqs.question: Do you have any safety rules?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have safety rules to ensure everyone’s security. Please review the information in your room and in the common areas.

faqs.question: Do you offer currency exchange services?
faqs.answer: We do not offer currency exchange services. Please visit a nearby bank or currency exchange office for assistance.

faqs.question: What is the minimum length of stay?
faqs.answer: The minimum length of stay varies depending on the time of year and the hostel. Please check your reservation's terms and conditions for more information.

faqs.question: Can I leave my luggage in the hostel after check-out?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide free luggage storage for our guests after check-out. Please contact the reception.

faqs.question: Do you offer breakfast?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer breakfast in all our hostels from 8:00 to 10:30. Please check our website for more information.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum age to make a reservation?
faqs.answer: Yes, guests must be at least 18 years old to make a reservation. If you have any issues, please contact us.

faqs.question: Can I bring my pet?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, we do not allow pets in our hostels.

faqs.question: Can I cook at the hostel?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a shared kitchen for our guests. Please make sure to clean up after using the kitchen.

faqs.question: Do you offer laundry services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer laundry services for an additional fee. Please contact us for more information.

faqs.question: Is there a cut-off time for check-in?
faqs.answer: Yes, the latest check-in time is at 11 p.m. Please contact us if you think you will arrive later. (Also via WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Do you have parking?
faqs.answer: We do not offer parking at our hostels. Please check our website for nearby parking information.

faqs.question: Can I reserve a room with a double bed?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer double-bed rooms at Duque Nest, Puerto Nest, Arena Nest, and Aguere Nest. Please check our website for details.

faqs.question: Can I book a smoking room?
faqs.answer: We do not allow smoking in our hostels. All our rooms are non-smoking.

faqs.question: Is there a deadline for check-out?
faqs.answer: Yes, the check-out deadline is 11 a.m. Please review your reservation’s terms and conditions for details.

faqs.question: Can I reserve a private room?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer private rooms for an additional fee. Please check our website for more information.

faqs.question: Can I pay for my reservation online?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer the option to pay online via PayPal, Bizum, or Revolut.

faqs.question: What is your hostel’s security policy?
faqs.answer: We have a security policy to ensure all guests’ safety. We also have 24-hour video surveillance in the common areas of all our hostels.

faqs.question: Can I bring my friends to the hostel?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can bring your friends as long as they respect the hostel’s rules and do not disturb other guests. Always ask first at reception.

faqs.question: Do you offer city tours?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer city tours and other activities for our guests. Please check our website for more information.

faqs.question: Can I book a room for a meeting or event?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, we do not offer facilities for meetings or events in our hostels.

faqs.question: Do you provide transportation to the airport?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer airport transportation for an additional fee. Please contact us for more information. (Also via WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Can I make a group reservation?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can accommodate group reservations. Please contact us for more information. (Also via WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Can I book a room with a private bathroom?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer rooms with a private bathroom for an additional fee. Please check our website for more information.

faqs.question: Can I book a room with bunk beds?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer rooms with bunk beds. Please check our website for more information.

faqs.question: Do you have a cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a cancellation policy. Please review your reservation’s terms and conditions for more information.

faqs.question: How can I modify my reservation?
faqs.answer: Please contact us to modify your reservation. Additional charges may apply. (Also via WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Can I make a reservation without a credit card?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot accept reservations without a valid credit card.

faqs.question: Can I smoke on the balcony?
faqs.answer: We do not allow smoking in any area of the hostel, including balconies.

faqs.question: Can I make a reservation for a shared dorm room?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer shared dormitory rooms. Please check our website for more information.

faqs.question: Can I make a reservation for a long-term stay?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can accommodate extended stays. Please contact us for more information.

faqs.question: Is there a laundry service in the hostel?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer laundry service for an additional fee. Please ask at reception for more information.

faqs.question: Does the hostel provide breakfast?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer breakfast service, and it is always included.

faqs.question: Can I leave my luggage before check-in or after check-out?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer luggage storage before check-in or after check-out. Always ask first at reception or contact us via WhatsApp.

faqs.question: Is there parking available at the hostel?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, we do not offer parking in our hostels.

faqs.question: Does the hostel have free Wi-Fi?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide free Wi-Fi in all our common areas and rooms.

faqs.question: Do you accept pets in the hostel?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, we do not allow pets in our hostels.

faqs.question: Does the hostel have a guest kitchen?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a shared kitchen for our guests.

faqs.question: Are towels available in the hostel?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide clean towels for our guests as a separate paid service for dorm rooms or free for private rooms.

faqs.question: Can I order room service?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, we do not offer room service in our hostels.

faqs.question: Is there a no-party policy in the hostel?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a no-party policy to ensure the comfort and safety of all our guests. However, we often organize themed nights or group games ourselves.

faqs.question: Is there airport transportation service from north to south, or vice versa?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer transportation from the north airport to the south airport or vice versa. It costs €55 to reserve. (Also via WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Can I smoke in the hostel?
faqs.answer: We do not allow smoking in any of our facilities. We have designated outdoor areas for smokers.

faqs.question: Is there any type of entertainment in the hostel?
faqs.answer: Yes, we organize social events and activities for our guests on special occasions. Please check our website for more information.

faqs.question: Can I book a room with a private bathroom?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer rooms with private bathrooms for an additional fee. Please check our website for more information.

faqs.question: Does the hostel offer currency exchange services?
faqs.answer: We do not offer currency exchange in our hostels, but we can provide information on where to do so in the city.

faqs.question: Does the hostel have disabled access?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have accessible rooms and common areas for disabled guests. Please contact us for more information. (Also via WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Does the hostel have 24-hour security service?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have staff available 24 hours a day for your comfort and security, and we have 24-hour video surveillance in the common areas of all our hostels.

faqs.question: Can I make a reservation by phone or email?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can reserve by phone or email. Please check our website for more information. We accept PayPal, Bizum, Revolut, etc. (+34 628991703 also on WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Do you offer any discount for longer stays?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for extended stays. Please contact us for more information.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my reservation?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your reservation following our cancellation policy. Please check our website for more details.

faqs.question: Is there a laundry service available at the hostel?

faqs.answer: Yes, we have a luggage storage service for our guests. Please ask at reception.

faqs.question: Is there any age restriction to stay at the hostel?
faqs.answer: Yes, you must be at least 18 years old to stay in our hostels.

faqs.question: Can I pay for my stay at the hostel with a credit card?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept credit cards to pay for your stay.

faqs.question: Does the hostel offer breakfast service?
faqs.answer: Yes, we always include breakfast service.

faqs.question: Does the hostel have room service?
faqs.answer: No, we do not offer room service in our hostels.

faqs.question: Can I cook in the hostel?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a communal kitchen for our guests to use.

faqs.question: Does the hostel have a no-refund policy?
faqs.answer: Yes, in certain cases we have a no-refund policy. Please review our cancellation policy on our website.

faqs.question: Are pets allowed in the hostel?
faqs.answer: We do not allow pets in our hostels, except in special cases. Please contact us for more information. (Also via WhatsApp)

faqs.question: Is there safety locker available under the bed?
faqs.answer: Under each bed, there is a drawer assigned to each person, which can be locked with a padlock. However, the padlock is the guest’s responsibility or can be purchased at reception in some cases, but it is not included.
